ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Acquisition"), NOT( Do_Not_Underwrite__c ), OR ( Credit_Score_Requirement__c = 0, ISBLANK(Credit_Score_Requirement__c) ) ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,"Acquisition"), Do_Not_Underwrite__c, NOT(ISBLANK(Credit_Score_Requirement__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When in the "Acquisition" stage, a Shared Solar System must have a "Minimum FICO Requirement" or be set to "Do Not Underwrite". It cannot be both.
